title: Patch Notes
content: ce release, playtesters, moderators, and Baldur’s Gate 3 Toolkit testers. Also updated the order of the voice actor credits to prioritise larger roles at the top. Fixed a bug causing an empty text-input panel to pop up and block gameplay. Fixed an '%%% Empty' passive feature appearing for rogues during Character Creation. Fixed a 1-frame glitch where swapping between two party members' Inventories would briefly show the first character's equipment in the inventory of the second character. Fixed
